knimeNode.name: Atom Signatures
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node allows to generate the signatures describing the neighborhood of a atom in CDK molecules.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows to generate the signatures describing the neighborhood of carbon or hydrogen atoms in CDK molecules. There are two types of signatures available, HOSE codes or atom signatures. If the minimum and maximum height of the signature are not specified, the signatures will be calculated for height 6. If the signature of specified height cannot be calculated, the signature with maximum possible height for that atom will be reported.
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the molecular structure
Chose the type of signature to be generated
Chose for which type of atom is the signature going to be generated
Costumize the minimum and maximum height of the signature

ports.outPort: As input but with new rows for each atom in the CDK moleucle for which the signatures were calculated
